resources.string:
You are about to permanently delete %s

Deleting an account from the authenticator won\'t disable the 2 factor authentication.

Make sure to disable the 2FA on the website/service the account is tied to.

You are about to permanently delete %s and %s

Deleting an account from the authenticator won\'t disable the 2 factor authentication.

Make sure to disable the 2FA on the website/service the account is tied to.
You can transfer your data to another device or Authenticator app
Copy, Save or Print your backup and store it in a secure location

plurals.name: label_delete_account_desc
plurals.item:
You\'re about to permanently delete %d account

Deleting an account from the authenticator won\'t disable the 2 factor authentication.

Make sure to disable the 2FA on the website/service the account is tied to.

You\'re about to permanently delete %d accounts

Deleting an account from the authenticator won\'t disable the 2 factor authentication.

Make sure to disable the 2FA on the website/service the account is tied to.
